title: Aspire Local Settings
description: Configuration file for .NET Aspire application host (.aspire/settings.json)

appHostPath.description: The path to the AppHost entry point file (e.g., "Program.cs", "app.ts"). Relative to the directory containing .aspire/settings.json.

channel.description: The Aspire channel to use for package resolution (e.g., "stable", "preview", "staging"). Used by aspire add to determine which NuGet feed to use.

features.description: Feature flags for enabling/disabling experimental or optional features. Key is feature name, value is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

defaultWatchEnabled.description: Enable or disable watch mode by default when running Aspire applications for automatic restarts on file changes

dotnetSdkInstallationEnabled.description: Enable or disable automatic .NET SDK installation when a required SDK version is missing

execCommandEnabled.description: Enable or disable the 'aspire exec' command for executing commands inside running resources

experimentalPolyglot:go.description: Enable or disable experimental Go language support for polyglot Aspire applications (requires polyglotSupportEnabled)

experimentalPolyglot:java.description: Enable or disable experimental Java language support for polyglot Aspire applications (requires polyglotSupportEnabled)

experimentalPolyglot:python.description: Enable or disable experimental Python language support for polyglot Aspire applications (requires polyglotSupportEnabled)

experimentalPolyglot:rust.description: Enable or disable experimental Rust language support for polyglot Aspire applications (requires polyglotSupportEnabled)

minimumSdkCheckEnabled.description: Enable or disable minimum .NET SDK version checking before running Aspire applications

orphanDetectionWithTimestampEnabled.description: Enable or disable timestamp-based orphan process detection to clean up stale Aspire processes

packageSearchDiskCachingEnabled.description: Enable or disable disk caching for package search results to improve performance

polyglotSupportEnabled.description: Enable or disable support for non-.NET (polyglot) languages and runtimes in Aspire applications

runningInstanceDetectionEnabled.description: Enable or disable detection of already running Aspire instances to prevent conflicts

showAllTemplates.description: Show all available templates including experimental ones in 'aspire new' and 'aspire init' commands

showDeprecatedPackages.description: Show or hide deprecated packages in 'aspire add' search results

stagingChannelEnabled.description: Enable or disable access to the staging channel for early access to preview features and packages

updateNotificationsEnabled.description: Check if update notifications are disabled and set version check environment variable

language.description: The language identifier for this AppHost (e.g., "typescript", "python"). Used to determine which runtime to use for execution.

sdkVersion.description: The Aspire SDK version used for this polyglot AppHost project. Determines the version of Aspire.Hosting packages to use.

overrideStagingFeed.description: [Internal] Override the NuGet feed URL used by the staging channel. When set, this URL is used instead of the default SHA-based build-specific feed.

overrideStagingQuality.description: [Internal] Override the package quality filter for the staging channel. Set to "Prerelease" when staging builds are not yet marked as stable to use the shared daily feed instead of the SHA-based feed. Valid values: "Stable", "Prerelease", "Both".

stagingPinToCliVersion.description: [Internal] When set to "true" and using the staging channel with Prerelease quality on the shared feed, all template and integration packages are pinned to the exact version of the installed CLI. This bypasses NuGet search entirely, ensuring version consistency.
